description: Describes the recommendations to resolve the issues for your DB instances, DB clusters, and DB parameter groups.

parameters.name: Locale
parameters.description: The language that you choose to return the list of recommendations. Valid values: en en_UK de es fr id it ja ko pt_BR zh_TW zh_CN.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A filter that specifies one or more recommendations to describe. Supported Filters: recommendation-id - Accepts a list of recommendation identifiers. The results list only includes the recommendations whose identifier is one of the specified filter values. status - Accepts a list of recommendation statuses. Valid values: active - The recommendations which are ready for you to apply. pending - The applied or scheduled recommendations which are in progress. resolved - The recommendations which are completed. dismissed - The recommendations that you dismissed. The results list only includes the recommendations whose status is one of the specified filter values. severity - Accepts a list of recommendation severities. The results list only includes the recommendations whose severity is one of the specified filter values. Valid values: high medium low informational type-id - Accepts a list of recommendation type identifiers. The results list only includes the recommendations whose type is one of the specified filter values. dbi-resource-id - Accepts a list of database resource identifiers. The results list only includes the recommendations that generated for the specified databases. cluster-resource-id - Accepts a list of cluster resource identifiers. The results list only includes the recommendations that generated for the specified clusters. pg-arn - Accepts a list of parameter group ARNs. The results list only includes the recommendations that generated for the specified parameter groups. cluster-pg-arn - Accepts a list of cluster parameter group ARNs. The results list only includes the recommendations that generated for the specified cluster parameter groups. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as IDs. The filters supported by a describe operation are documented with the describe operation. The following actions can be filtered: DescribeDBClusterBacktracks DescribeDBClusterEndpoints DescribeDBClusters DescribeDBInstances DescribeDBRecommendations DescribeDBShardGroups DescribePendingMaintenanceActions The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. One or more filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. (string) ---

nested_items.name: DBRecommendations
nested_items.description: A list of recommendations which is returned from DescribeDBRecommendations API request.

nested_items.name: RecommendationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the recommendation.

nested_items.name: TypeId
nested_items.description: A value that indicates the type of recommendation. This value determines how the description is rendered.

nested_items.name: Severity
nested_items.description: The severity level of the recommendation. The severity level can help you decide the urgency with which to address the recommendation.
high.
medium.
low.
informational.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the RDS resource associated with the recommendation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the recommendation.
active - The recommendations which are ready for you to apply.
pending - The applied or scheduled recommendations which are in progress.
resolved - The recommendations which are completed.
dismissed - The recommendations that you dismissed.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the recommendation was created. For example, 2023-09-28T01:13:53.931000+00:00.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the recommendation was last updated.

nested_items.name: Detection
nested_items.description: A short description of the issue identified for this recommendation. The description might contain markdown.

nested_items.name: Recommendation
nested_items.description: A short description of the recommendation to resolve an issue. The description might contain markdown.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A detailed description of the recommendation. The description might contain markdown.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: The reason why this recommendation was created. The information might contain markdown.

nested_items.name: RecommendedActions
nested_items.description: A list of recommended actions.

nested_items.name: ActionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the recommended action.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: A short description to summarize the action. The description might contain markdown.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A detailed description of the action. The description might contain markdown.

nested_items.name: Operation
nested_items.description: An API operation for the action.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: The parameters for the API operation.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the parameter to use with the RecommendedAction API operation.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the parameter to use with the RecommendedAction API operation.

nested_items.name: ApplyModes
nested_items.description: The methods to apply the recommended action.
manual - The action requires you to resolve the recommendation manually.
immediately - The action is applied immediately.
next-maintainance-window - The action is applied during the next scheduled maintainance.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the action.
ready.
applied.
scheduled.
resolved.

nested_items.name: IssueDetails
nested_items.description: The details of the issue.

nested_items.name: PerformanceIssueDetails
nested_items.description: A detailed description of the issue when the recommendation category is performance.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time when the performance issue started.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time when the performance issue stopped.

nested_items.name: Metrics
nested_items.description: The metrics that are relevant to the performance issue.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of a metric.

nested_items.name: References
nested_items.description: A list of metric references (thresholds).

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the metric reference.

nested_items.name: ReferenceDetails
nested_items.description: The details of a performance issue.

nested_items.name: ScalarReferenceDetails
nested_items.description: The metric reference details when the reference is a scalar.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of a scalar reference.

nested_items.name: StatisticsDetails
nested_items.description: The details of different statistics for a metric. The description might contain markdown.

nested_items.name: MetricQuery
nested_items.description: The query to retrieve metric data points.

nested_items.name: PerformanceInsightsMetricQuery
nested_items.description: The Performance Insights query that you can use to retrieve Performance Insights metric data points.

nested_items.name: Dimensions
nested_items.description: A list of specific dimensions from a dimension group. If this list isn't included, then all of the dimensions in the group were requested, or are present in the response.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Group
nested_items.description: The available dimension groups for Performance Insights metric type.

nested_items.name: Limit
nested_items.description: The maximum number of items to fetch for this dimension group.

nested_items.name: Metric
nested_items.description: The name of a Performance Insights metric to be measured.
db.load.avg - A scaled representation of the number of active sessions for the database engine.
db.sampledload.avg - The raw number of active sessions for the database engine.
The counter metrics listed in Performance Insights operating system counters in the Amazon Aurora User Guide.

nested_items.name: Analysis
nested_items.description: The analysis of the performance issue. The information might contain markdown.

nested_items.name: ContextAttributes
nested_items.description: The supporting attributes to explain the recommended action.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of ContextAttribute.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of ContextAttribute.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The category of the recommendation.
performance efficiency.
security.
reliability.
cost optimization.
operational excellence.
sustainability.

nested_items.name: Source
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services service that generated the recommendations.

nested_items.name: TypeDetection
nested_items.description: A short description of the recommendation type. The description might contain markdown.

nested_items.name: TypeRecommendation
nested_items.description: A short description that summarizes the recommendation to fix all the issues of the recommendation type. The description might contain markdown.

nested_items.name: Impact
nested_items.description: A short description that explains the possible impact of an issue.

nested_items.name: AdditionalInfo
nested_items.description: Additional information about the recommendation. The information might contain markdown.

nested_items.name: Links
nested_items.description: A link to documentation that provides additional information about the recommendation.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The text with the link to documentation for the recommendation.

nested_items.name: Url
nested_items.description: The URL for the documentation for the recommendation.

nested_items.name: IssueDetails
nested_items.description: Details of the issue that caused the recommendation.

nested_items.name: PerformanceIssueDetails
nested_items.description: A detailed description of the issue when the recommendation category is performance.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time when the performance issue started.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time when the performance issue stopped.

nested_items.name: Metrics
nested_items.description: The metrics that are relevant to the performance issue.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of a metric.

nested_items.name: References
nested_items.description: A list of metric references (thresholds).

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the metric reference.

nested_items.name: ReferenceDetails
nested_items.description: The details of a performance issue.

nested_items.name: ScalarReferenceDetails
nested_items.description: The metric reference details when the reference is a scalar.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of a scalar reference.

nested_items.name: StatisticsDetails
nested_items.description: The details of different statistics for a metric. The description might contain markdown.

nested_items.name: MetricQuery
nested_items.description: The query to retrieve metric data points.

nested_items.name: PerformanceInsightsMetricQuery
nested_items.description: The Performance Insights query that you can use to retrieve Performance Insights metric data points.

nested_items.name: Dimensions
nested_items.description: A list of specific dimensions from a dimension group. If this list isn't included, then all of the dimensions in the group were requested, or are present in the response.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Group
nested_items.description: The available dimension groups for Performance Insights metric type.

nested_items.name: Limit
nested_items.description: The maximum number of items to fetch for this dimension group.

nested_items.name: Metric
nested_items.description: The name of a Performance Insights metric to be measured.
db.load.avg - A scaled representation of the number of active sessions for the database engine.
db.sampledload.avg - The raw number of active sessions for the database engine.
The counter metrics listed in Performance Insights operating system counters in the Amazon Aurora User Guide.

nested_items.name: Analysis
nested_items.description: The analysis of the performance issue. The information might contain markdown.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous DBRecommendationsMessage request. This token can be used later in a DescribeDBRecomendations request.
